channel.title: How to stop npcs from following u? ++rep
channel.description:
How do u stop NPC's from foloing u...or no one knows then is there any tut TO MAKE EM FOLO U?
i will give rep for someone who gives me eaither 1[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 11:07:15 PM[/size][hr]anyone???????[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 11:14:31 PM[/size][hr]..........[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 11:23:33 PM[/size][hr]r u serouis
